column2: Ignored my PR for 6 months, then duplicated it (in a half-assed way) the day after I made a bump comment. When I discovered this and complained they responded claiming they didn't know about my PR (hard to believe due to the timing of their commits) and called me "pouty". That comment was later deleted and replaced with one that didn't contain the lie and insults. https://github.com/AloriumTechnology/XLR8LFSR#1
Seems like it's just a bunch of repository copies.
Not receptive to PRs fixing legitimate bugs: https://github.com/bhagman/SoftPWM/pull/3#issuecomment-395299903 https://github.com/bhagman/Tone/pull/6

Instead of merging my pull request, they attempted to duplicate my work (but failed), then closed my PR without comment. After I pointed out the error, the fixed it, but still didn't bother to comment. https://github.com/ElectronicCats/ElectronicCats_InternalTemperatureZero/pull/1
Wasted a bunch of my time, then claimed they were trolling me. https://github.com/enjoyneering/RotaryEncoder/pull/1

Closed my PR w/o comment, then duplicated my work, then deleted my comments asking why it had been closed (I hadn't noticed they had duplicated my work), then blocked me. https://github.com/EricConnerApps/Retro-Pin/pull/1 https://github.com/EricConnerApps/Retro-Pin/commit/016ee2e6d0d5a61df03e30b62178109a8e262657
Duplicated my PR in a super janky way, then closed my PR without any explanation. https://github.com/G6EJD/ESP8266-Remote-Message-Board/pull/5

AKA Vaclav. Super rude on the arduino/Arduino issue tracker and forum. https://github.com/arduino/Arduino/issues?q=is%3Aissue+author%3Ajulyjim https://github.com/arduino/Arduino/issues?q=is%3Aissue+vaclav https://www.google.com/search?q=vaclav&sitesearch=http%3A%2F%2Fforum.arduino.cc
Not receptive to PRs fixing legitimate bugs: https://github.com/bhagman/SoftPWM/pull/3#issuecomment-395299903 https://github.com/bhagman/Tone/pull/6

Closed two valid pull requests without any explanation and locked the conversation, even though there had been no comments in it. https://github.com/shield-9/Arduino-LIGHTSTACK/pull/1 https://github.com/shield-9/Arduino-BME280/pull/1

AKA VogonJeltz. Super rude on the arduino/Arduino issue tracker. https://github.com/arduino/Arduino/issues?q=is%3Aissue+author%3Ashiftleftplusone https://github.com/arduino/Arduino/issues?q=is%3Aissue+vogonjeltz
Super rude on the arduino/Arduino Issue tracker. https://github.com/arduino/Arduino/issues?utf8=%E2%9C%93&q=%20author%3Atofrnr%20
Seems to just be all copies (not forks) of other people's repos.
They're doing some non-standard thing not using the Arduino IDE and don't welcome anything to improve Arduino IDE compatibility. https://github.com/windykeyboards/butt-in/pull/1
